title: Bann Timers
body:
Hey L.O.L.
   I've had a lot of ban timers recently, I like the thought of them, but sometimes people leave the games because of internet crashes, 2-3 of my more resent ones... and the one i just got today my Pc gave me a blue screen of death right when the jg mobs started to spawn {{item:3151}}... then after i reload my computer and enter the game again it says that u have been inactive for a long period of time your game will now close {{item:3070}}  ... and have to reload the game FOR A SECOND TIME {{champion:32}}... and continued my game from there... so could you remove this ban timer i now have that is partly your systems fault, and come up with a way to track summoners ping and not give them ban timers for internet crashes... like maybe when they hit the Exit Game button it will show up a box that says "(Summoner) has abandoned the game"  that will clear a lot of ban timers and make your game a whole lot more enjoyable. 
    Sincerely, Beffybil

replies.body: and I'm sorry for snapping earlier... shouldn't of done that wasn't very grown up thing to do.
Ok well even though I don't entirely agree with your system it gave me a laugh so thanks anyway.

But when part of the problems your own system fault like this was, and that was the first time my computer has ever given me the blue screen off death, and I still rejoined the game like seriously... I've had so many ban timer recently and none are my fault that I'm about to quit league. because it took a whole 3 mins to restart my computer, plus an extra min to restart the game after YOUR systems failure. A. for being gone for that short of a time I should be getting a ban. and B. it's partly YOUR fault.

With your example, you are completely right.  We never punish a player for leaving a single game because we know that frankly, shit happens.  Pool on fire, cat on fire, grandma on fire, something always catches on fire forcing you away from your computer.

However, you have either AFK'd or DC'd in 15 separate games in the last 30 days alone.  Given the consistency, penalties were levied against your account.  That being said, we can definitely help resolve any technical issues you are experiencing to make sure this doesn't happen again!  Other than the BSOD, are there other technical issues that keep happening?

HELP, MY FIRE 

IS ON FIRE

AHHHH

Sorry guys, 15th time this month.

im frustrated at this because ya sure it ruins game play for others, but it's not are fault.  Y should I be being punished for something that I can't do anything about, that y I gave the idea of tracking ping and stuff (yes I realize it would help this situation at all) but for my other 2 ban timers before this it would of help out a lot, and when u only have a small amount of time to play, I don't have the chance to deal with the timer.

And now not only am I frustrated at your system but also at you Dartagnan because I didn't leave the game my game crashed, and then Your system glitched making me have to reload my game, an I clearly already understood y u have ban timers and who it affects, but u are unjustly punishing people who are the victims not the guilty.

Definitely get where you are coming from.  These issues do seem completely out of your control, but at the end of the day, you leaving the game is ruining the gaming experience of up to 9 other players.  It is for this reason that we put in penalties/suspensions for leaving.  Because of this, I can't reduce your penalties at all :(

Are you still experiencing these issues however?  If so I should be able to respond with some troubleshooting steps that should help out!
